column5: Just want to ask when is the walleye opening date in Scogug and Peterbororugh area, May 10 or May 17?  thanks in advance!
May 10th. (always the 2nd Saturday in May)  May 3rd on the Bay of Quinte
NY State opener is always the first Saturday in May (this year May 3rd) in case you want to get a head start on them their walleyes
walleye opener down here is open all year zone 19 but it started today for me anyways went 5- 9 was a good day with the biggest being 26 inches
